channel.title: Victorops on Metricly Docs
channel.description: Recent content in Victorops on Metricly Docs

item.title: VictorOps Notifications
item.description: Configuration 1. Copy REST API URL From VictorOps Login to your VictorOps account. Navigate to Alert Behavior > Integrations. Search for Metricly and select the card. Click Enable Integration. Copy the Service API Endpoint. This is required for the next step. 2. Create a Webhook notification in Metricly In Metricly, navigate to the Policy Editor. Click tab 3, Notifications. Click Add Notification and select Webhook as the Notification Type.
